properties.title: Welcoming Space

properties.description: St Andrew's Church has a large accessible warm space with comfortable chairs, free wifi access, accessible toilets and baby changing facilities. We offer free hot refreshments and light lunches are served Monday, Wednesday and Thursday from 12 NOON. On Fridays a substantial two course lunch is served from 12 Noon. Come for a chat, to work, to keep warm and enjoy delicious refreshments and lunches. Everyone is welcome!
properties.title: Winter Warm Welcome Space
